graph.original_query: I want to know the details of features for Mahindra XUV 3XO, use a single step for Retriever Agent but use multiple iterations in a single step to fetch detailed information, In the final iteration of the Retriever Agent combine outputs from previous iterations as final step output and then create a report.

The Diesel engine is 1498 cc while the Petrol engine is 1197 cc . It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel type the XUV 3XO has a mileage of 17.96 to 20.6 kmpl. The XUV 3XO is a 5 seater 3 cylinder car and has length of 3990 mm, width of 1821 mm and a wheelbase of 2600. Login OTP has been sent to Resend OTP Submit OTP Select City We need your city to customize your experience Select City V3Cars Mahindra 3XO Engine Specification Overview Price Dimensions Specifications 1.2 Turbo Petrol Manual 1.2 Turbo Petrol Automatic 1.5 Diesel Manual 1.5 Diesel Automatic 1.2 Turbo Petrol Manual (131PS) 1.2 Turbo Petrol Automatic (131PS) Mileage Variants Videos Reviews Others Comparison News &\r                     Top Stories Monthly\r                     Sales Images Competitiors Service Cost Brochure Colours Pros & Cons FAQs Offers Discounts CSD Price Mahindra 3XO Configurations The Mahindra 3XO is available with multiple engine options: a 1.2L turbo petrol, a 1.2L turbo petrol (131PS) and a 1.5L turbo diesel. 3XO's 1.2L turbo petrol engine is available with a 6-speed MT Manual and a 6-speed TC Automatic transmission that makes 111PS of power at 5000rpm and 200Nm of torque between 1500rpm and 3750rpm. 3XO's 1.2L turbo petrol (131PS) engine gets a 6-speed MT Manual and a 6-speed TC Automatic transmission which churns out 131PS of power at 5000rpm and 230Nm of torque between 1500rpm and 3750rpm. 3XO's 1.5L turbo diesel engine gets a 6-speed MT Manual and a 6-speed AMT Automatic transmission which is rated to deliver 117PS of power at 3750rpm and 300Nm of torque between 1500rpm and 2500rpm. The 3XO is available with following engine-transmission configurations: 1.2L Turbo Petrol with 6-speed MT (7 variants) 1.2L Turbo Petrol with 6-speed TC (4 variants) 1.5L Turbo Diesel with 6-speed MT (7 variants) 1.5L Turbo Diesel with 6-speed AMT (3 variants) 1.2L Turbo Petrol with 6-speed MT (4 variants) 1.2L Turbo Petrol with 6-speed TC (4 variants) Understanding its engine is key! Get all the facts on 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO's displacement, cylinder, power, torque, mileage and transmission configurations. Additionally, we'll break down the various configurations available with this engine to help you find the XUV 3XO that best suits your needs. nodes.description: Fetch detailed features of Mahindra XUV 3XO using multiple iterations within a single RetrieverAgent step, combining the outputs from previous iterations in the final iteration.
nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch detailed information on features of Mahindra XUV 3XO. Use multiple iterations to gather information. In the final iteration, combine the outputs from all previous iterations as the final output. Specify the number of iterations for gathering details. Ensure all aspects of the features are covered in detail like Engine, Safety, Comfort, Interior, Exterior, Technology, and Infotainment. The final combined output must contain all of these details exhaustively.

Login OTP has been sent to Resend OTP Submit OTP Select City We need your city to customize your experience Select City V3Cars Mahindra 3XO Engine Specification Overview Price Dimensions Specifications 1.2 Turbo Petrol Manual 1.2 Turbo Petrol Automatic 1.5 Diesel Manual 1.5 Diesel Automatic 1.2 Turbo Petrol Manual (131PS) 1.2 Turbo Petrol Automatic (131PS) Mileage Variants Videos Reviews Others Comparison News &\r                     Top Stories Monthly\r                     Sales Images Competitiors Service Cost Brochure Colours Pros & Cons FAQs Offers Discounts CSD Price Mahindra 3XO Configurations The Mahindra 3XO is available with multiple engine options: a 1.2L turbo petrol, a 1.2L turbo petrol (131PS) and a 1.5L turbo diesel. 3XO's 1.2L turbo petrol engine is available with a 6-speed MT Manual and a 6-speed TC Automatic transmission that makes 111PS of power at 5000rpm and 200Nm of torque between 1500rpm and 3750rpm. 3XO's 1.2L turbo petrol (131PS) engine gets a 6-speed MT Manual and a 6-speed TC Automatic transmission which churns out 131PS of power at 5000rpm and 230Nm of torque between 1500rpm and 3750rpm. 3XO's 1.5L turbo diesel engine gets a 6-speed MT Manual and a 6-speed AMT Automatic transmission which is rated to deliver 117PS of power at 3750rpm and 300Nm of torque between 1500rpm and 2500rpm. The 3XO is available with following engine-transmission configurations: 1.2L Turbo Petrol with 6-speed MT (7 variants) 1.2L Turbo Petrol with 6-speed TC (4 variants) 1.5L Turbo Diesel with 6-speed MT (7 variants) 1.5L Turbo Diesel with 6-speed AMT (3 variants) 1.2L Turbo Petrol with 6-speed MT (4 variants) 1.2L Turbo Petrol with 6-speed TC (4 variants) Understanding its engine is key! nodes.description: Create a comprehensive report detailing the features of Mahindra XUV 3XO based on the output from the RetrieverAgent.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a comprehensive report detailing the features of Mahindra XUV 3XO. Use the details provided in the input to create the report. The report should be detailed and exhaustive, covering all aspects of the car features like Engine, Safety, Comfort, Interior, Exterior, Technology, and Infotainment. The output should be formatted in a human readable format such as markdown.
